```{r}
library(Tax4Fun)
library(MASS)

# Let's try with the rarefied OTU table first:
# I should also check with % of sequences are included in this:
QIIME_data <- importQIIMEData('../Seq_data/Updated_files/biom/IBP_mc10_ms5000_w_tax.txt')
QIIME_data_s115 <- importQIIMEData('../Seq_data/Updated_files/biom/Full_DADA_table/full_biom_w_tax.txt')

tax4fun_results <- Tax4Fun(QIIME_data_s115, folderReferenceData = '~/Desktop/tax4fun_functional_16s_annotation/SILVA115/')


write.matrix(tax4fun_results$Tax4FunProfile, file='~/Desktop/tax4fun_functional_16s_annotation/tax4fun_results.txt', sep="\t")
```
